original_title: Frankie Valli & The Four Seasons: A Life On Stage
overview: Take a trip down memory lane with the “Jersey Boys” on the 60th anniversary of the release of their first #1 hit, “Sherry.” The group that sold over 175 million records is captured live at the 10,000-seat Mohegan Sun Casino in Connecticut.
title: Frankie Valli & The Four Seasons: A Life On Stage
